title: Biggest Movers: XRP, MATIC Move to Multi-Week Highs on Wednesday
description: XRP was a big mover on Wednesday, despite cryptocurrency markets mostly consolidating in today’s session. title: The Role of AI and ML in Accelerating Early Drug Discovery
description: The process of taking a drug molecule from concept to commercialization is a lengthy and costly endeavor, typically spanning 10-15 years and incurring expenses of up to $2 billion per successfully launched drug when factoring in failures. title: CoinEx to resume crypto services after $70m Lazarus hack

title: AVAX Price Could Drop To $8.75 Support Despite New Developments
description:
